sentences.en: A man of irreproachable conduct commands the respect of others.
sentences.cn: 为人处世品行方正的人受人敬佩.

sentences.en: BIO - BEAUTE commits to providing irreproachable cosmetic quality: exceptional textures and 100 % natural fragrances.
sentences.cn: BEAUTE保证提供无可指责的护肤品质量: 优异的质地和100%天然香味.

sentences.en: He seemed to feel that by his own irreproachable regularity he would clear himself of blame.
sentences.cn: 他觉得靠自己这种完美无缺的条理性,就可以免于旁人的责备.

sentences.en: Irreproachable proactive work, a strong sense of responsibility, a strong dedication and team spirit.
sentences.cn: 品行端正,工作积极主动, 责任心强, 有较强的敬业精神及团队合作精神.

sentences.en: It emerged that her past behaviour was far from irreproachable.
sentences.cn: 事实表明,她过去的行为绝非无可非议.

sentences.en: It emerges that her past behaviour was far from irreproachable.
sentences.cn: 真相暴露了,她过去的行为远不是无可指责的.

sentences.en: She welcomed her unexpected visitor with irreproachable politeness.
sentences.cn: 她以无可指摘的礼仪接待了不速之客。

words.tran_cn: 无可指责的；[法]无过失的

trans.tran_en: something, such as someone’s behaviour, that is irreproachable is so good that you cannot criticize it
